QuestData.Title: With a Little Help...
QuestData.Description: Fine, I be helpin' ya. He not gettin' outa payin' me alimony that easy! 'Sides, there be the baby he had with me sistah ta take care of!$B$BFirst thing we needin' is the innards of his closest friends. That'd be his cap'ns.$B$BGo down there an' pay the three of them a visit.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Evil Dolly's Heart, Seadog Fajardo's Lungs, and Lilly Landlubber's Liver.
QuestData.CompletionText: A fresh heart, lungs, an' liver be what we needin'. The ones from his cap'ns will have ta do though they all be likely picked.
QuestData.RewardText: <Ajamon makes a face at the state of the organs.>$B$BThey's gonna have ta do. It not be like he had many friends. Ain't that right, Two-Tusk?
